abstract: Bank of America remains the largest banking institution in the United States by total assets, The Houston Business Journal reported, an analysis released Wednesday by SNL Financial.
snippet: Bank of America remains the largest banking institution in the United States by total assets, The Houston Business Journal reported, an analysis released Wednesday by SNL Financial.
lead_paragraph: According to an analysis released Wednesday, Bank of America remains the largest banking institution in the country by total assets, The Houston Business Journal reported, citing data from SNL Financial.

headline.main: Bank of America Still Tops in Assets
